level.heading: Restrictions on use and transfer of Salvage Vehicles.

level.text: No Salvage Vehicle may be registered under subchapter I of Chapter 15 of this title.
Ownership of a Salvage Vehicle shall be transferred only through the use of a Salvage Title.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-307
level.text: For Law 15-307, see notes following ยง 50-1331.01.
